trans-unit.source: GR is a universal framework for cross-platform visualization applications. It offers developers a compact, portable and consistent graphics library for their programs. Applications range from publication quality 2D graphs to the representation of complex 3D scenes.
trans-unit.target: GR是跨平台可视化应用程序的通用框架。它为开发人员的程序提供了紧凑，可移植且一致的图形库。应用范围从出版质量的2D图形到复杂的3D场景的表示。

trans-unit.source: GR is essentially based on an implementation of a Graphical Kernel System (GKS) and OpenGL. As a self-contained system it can quickly and easily be integrated into existing applications (i.e. using the
trans-unit.target: GR本质上是基于图形内核系统（GKS）和OpenGL的实现。作为一个独立的系统，它可以快速轻松地集成到现有应用程序中（即使用

trans-unit.source: GR was developed by the Scientific IT-Systems group at the Peter Gruenberg Institute at Forschunsgzentrum Juelich. The main development has been done by Josef Heinen who currently maintains the software, but there are other developers who currently make valuable contributions. Special thanks to Florian Rhiem (GR3] and Christian Felder (qtgr, setup.py).
trans-unit.target: GR是由Forschunsgzentrum Juelich的Peter Gruenberg研究所的科学IT系统小组开发的。主要开发工作由当前维护该软件的Josef Heinen完成，但当前还有其他开发人员做出了宝贵贡献。特别感谢Florian Rhiem（GR3）和Christian Felder（qtgr，setup.py）。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with version 0.10.0 GR supports inline graphics which shows up in IPython’s Qt Console or interactive computing environments for Python and Julia, such as IPython and Jupyter. An interesting example can be found here.
trans-unit.target: 从0.10.0版本开始，GR支持内联图形，这些图形会显示在IPython的Qt Console或适用于Python和Julia的交互式计算环境中 ，例如IPython和 Jupyter。一个有趣的例子可以在这里找到 。

trans-unit.source: For further information please refer to the GR home page.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参阅 GR主页。

trans-unit.source: Starting with release 0.6 GR can be used as a backend for Matplotlib and significantly improve the performance of existing Matplotlib or PyPlot applications written in Python or Julia, respectively. In this tutorial section you can find some examples.
trans-unit.target: 从0.6版开始，GR可以用作Matplotlib的后端， 并显着提高分别用Python或Julia编写的现有Matplotlib或PyPlot应用程序的性能。在 本教程部分中，您可以找到一些示例。

trans-unit.source: The GR framework can be used in imperative programming systems or integrated into modern object-oriented systems, in particular those based on GUI toolkits. GR is characterized by its high interoperability and can be used with modern web technologies. The GR framework is especially suitable for real-time or signal processing environments.
trans-unit.target: 的GR框架可在命令性编程系统中使用或集成到现代的面向对象的系统，特别是那些基于GUI工具包。GR具有很高的互操​​作性，可与现代Web技术一起使用。的GR 框架是特别适用于实时或信号处理环境。
